units.title: Pool PSC lines before organoid generation
units.text: we pooled PSC lines (5,000 cells per line) before organoid generation
units.rationale: Establishes the initial cell mixture for mosaic organoid creation.

units.title: Assess proliferation via flow cytometry
units.text: we longitudinally assessed the proliferation rate of organoids derived from individual lines in two differentiation replicates through flow cytometry-based cell cycle analysis.
units.rationale: Measures growth dynamics across lines over time.

units.title: Immunofluorescence characterization of mCBOs
units.text: We first characterized mCBOs by immunofluorescence for canonical markers of neurodevelopment previously defined for organoids
units.rationale: Validates organoid identity and developmental stage.

units.title: Generate mosaic CBOs by pooling donors
units.text: pooling PSC lines from multiple donors to generate mosaic CBOs
units.rationale: Creates mixed‑genotype organoids for multiplexed analysis.

units.title: Individual CBO generation and post‑dissociation pooling
units.text: CBOs were generated individually from the PSC lines and pooled after organoid dissociation for single-cell library preparation
units.rationale: Enables downstream multiplexing while preserving line‑specific organoid development.

units.title: Demultiplexing with all available tools
units.text: Next, we performed demultiplexing again using all the above tools
units.rationale: Evaluates genotype assignment consistency across algorithms.

units.title: Develop SCanSNP for genotype deconvolution
units.text: we set out to develop a new method, SCanSNP (Fig. 3a), to overcome observed limitations
units.rationale: Introduces a custom computational solution for cell‑identity calling.

units.title: Benchmark demultiplexing with ground‑truth priors
units.text: we benchmarked them with ground truth priors using (1) five in silico multiplexed datasets with varying degree of balance among genotypes and (2) two ad hoc experiments
units.rationale: Provides controlled evaluation of algorithm performance.

units.title: Longitudinal scRNA‑seq profiling of mCBOs
units.text: we longitudinally profiled the resulting mCBOs through scRNA-seq at 50, 100 and 300 d of differentiation, following the same protocol previously used and benchmarked
units.rationale: Captures developmental trajectories across time points.

units.title: Assess demultiplexing algorithm performance
units.text: For the first strategy, assess the demultiplexing performance of the different algorithms
units.rationale: Quantifies accuracy of genotype assignment methods.
